alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pondera; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:47PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Pondera and southeastern Toole Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 447 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Conrad, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Conrad, Dunkirk and Ledger. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 333 and 353. Highway 2 between mile markers 283 and 294. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for north central Montana.
